tasks.task: Construct a DIY cold frame for winter gardening
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (lumber, plastic sheeting)
Create a wooden frame (测量木材尺寸, 切割木材, 稳固框架结构)
Cover the frame with plastic sheeting (铺展塑料薄膜, 固定边缘以防寒风)
Position the cold frame over garden beds (选定种植位置, 安装覆盖)

tasks.task: Extend gardening season with cold frame
subtasks: Identify suitable winter vegetables for planting in cold frame
Prepare soil and seeds for cold-hardy crops
Maintain cold frame (定期检查, 清理积雪, 确保通风)
Harvest vegetables throughout winter months

tasks.task: Promote gardening through social media engagement
subtasks: Like and subscribe to the channel
Share gardening tips and updates (制作视频或帖子)

tasks.task: Construct a DIY cold frame for winter gardening
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (lumber, plastic sheeting)
Create a wooden frame (measure, cut, assemble)
Cover the frame with plastic sheeting (install securely)
Position the cold frame over garden beds (choose location, secure)

tasks.task: Extend gardening season with cold frame
subtasks: Identify suitable winter vegetables (e.g., kale, spinach, carrots)
Prepare soil and seeds for planting
Maintain cold frame (check, deal with snow, ensure ventilation)
Harvest vegetables throughout winter months

tasks.task: Promote gardening through social media engagement
subtasks: Like and subscribe to the channel
